builder.description: Build any Creativeshire component (widget, section, behaviour, driver, etc.). Reads relevant spec based on task.

reviewer.description: Review any component for architecture compliance (read-only)

coordinator.description: Plan tasks, manage workflows, delegate to builder/reviewer/validator

analyst.description: Analyze external references (URLs, screenshots, code) and create backlog items

validator.description: Runtime validation - check pages load, no console errors, no hydration failures
